currentMinute.label: The timestamp of the beginning of the minute during which the measures are taken

msecPerGcAvg.label: Average milliseconds per GC operation of any type during the last minute

msecPerGcMax.label: Maximum milliseconds per GC operation of any type during the last minute

msecTotal.label: Total milliseconds for all types of GC operations during the last minute

callsIncrementalMarking.label: Number of calls to the Incremental marker during the last minute

callsMarkSweepCompactor.label: Number of calls to the Mark/Sweep/Compact (major) GC during the last minute

callsScavenger.label: Number of calls to the Scavenge (minor) GC during the last minute

callsWeakPhantomCallbacks.label: Number of calls to Weak/Phantom callbacks during the last minute

msecIncrementalMarking.label: Milliseconds spent doing Incremental marking during the last minute

msecMarkSweepCompactor.label: Milliseconds spent by the Mark/Sweep/Compactor during the last minute

msecScavenger.label: Milliseconds spent by the Scavenger during the last minute

msecWeakPhantomCallbacks.label: Milliseconds spent in weak/phantom callbacks during the last minute

cpuSystem.label: CPU system seconds since last polling. May be > 1 on multiple cores.

cpuUser.label: CPU user seconds since last polling. May be > 1 on multiple cores.

ramExternal.label: C++ memory bound to V8 JS objects

ramRss.label: Resident Set Size (heap, code segment, stack)

nDocuments.label: Total number of documents across subscriptions. Each appearance in a subscription counts.

nSubs.label: Total number of Subscriptions  across sessions
